name: overeagerness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being too eager to do or have something: Something about her suggested a slight overeagerness to please. Over-eagerness was the main danger facing the team. Related word
overeager
More examplesFewer examplesIn our overeagerness to interpret the results, we missed the most important finding.She preferred his shyness to the over-eagerness of other young men. The typical over-eagerness of your twenties fades as you get older.Bravado and overeagerness are not appealing qualities in job applicants .Officers' over-eagerness to search the property without a warrant made it impossible to bring drugs charges.
